ResourceHeader.Description: This dataset contains operational parameters for the instrument (corresponding to a TC sent from ground). Change in operational parameters can have an impact on data time resolution, sensitivity and can influence the instrument response.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator(s), the RPC-MIP Team, the ESA Planetary Science Archive as well as the CDPP (Centre de Données de la Physique des Plasmas) for the provision of these data when making a publication using these data. Principal Investigator(s) : P. Henri (LPC2E/CNRS, Orléans, France)

Parameter.Name: Interference frequency 1
Parameter.Description: Interference frequencies to be suppressed during the extremum computation in active modes

Parameter.Name: Interference frequency 2
Parameter.Description: Interference frequencies to be suppressed during the extremum computation in active modes

Parameter.Name: Interference frequency 3
Parameter.Description: Interference frequencies to be suppressed during the extremum computation in active modes

Parameter.Name: Level of the transmission signal
Parameter.Description: Takes one of the following values: 1.000 full level (156 mV RMS in MIP mode, 30 V RMS in LDL mode) - 0.500 nominal level (78 mV RMS in MIP mode, 15 V RMS in LDL mode) - 0.250 low level (39 mV RMS in MIP mode, 7.5 V RMS in LDL mode) - 0.125 minimum level (19.5 mV RMS in MIP mode, 3.75 V RMS in LDL mode)

Parameter.Name: Selection of the transmitter (odd sweeps)
Parameter.Description: Takes one of the following values: mono with E1 - mono with E2 - stereo with E1-E2 phased - stereo with E1-E2 anti-phased

Parameter.Name: Selection of the transmitter (even sweeps)
Parameter.Description: Takes one of the following values: mono with E1 - mono with E2 - stereo with E1-E2 phased - stereo with E1-E2 anti-phased

Parameter.Name: Selection of a MIP alone mode or LDL mode
Parameter.Description: Possible values are MIP alone or LDL mode

Parameter.Name: Autoloop
Parameter.Description: Autoloop : an auto-loop can be set between emission and reception - The field takes one of the following values: MIP with sensor - MIP auto-loop ON

Parameter.Name: Coding level in passive mode
Parameter.Description: Coding level for the power spectrum in the Passive mode - The field takes one of the following values: 2 (16 values from 0 to 30 dB) - 4 (16 values from 0 to 60 dB) - with 0 dB = 0.6 microV*Hz**-0.5

Parameter.Name: Amplitude threshold
Parameter.Description: Amplitude threshold for the extremum detection - The field takes one of the following values: 1 - 2 - 4 - 8 - with 0 dB = 0.6 microV*Hz**-0.5

Parameter.Name: MIP Watchdog
Parameter.Description: Possibility to inhibit the MIP watchdog . The field takes one of the following values: watchdog on - watchdog off

Parameter.Name: Telemetry Rate
Parameter.Description: Selection of the telemetry rate.The field takes one of the following values: minimum rate - normal rate - burst rate

Parameter.Name: Sequence Number
Parameter.Description: Selection of the sequence number. The field takes one of the following values: nominal sequence - complementary sequence nr 1 - complementary sequence nr 2 - complementary sequence nr 3 - complementary sequence nr 4 - complementary sequence nr 5 - complementary sequence nr 6 - complementary sequence nr 7 -

Parameter.Name: LDL Type
Parameter.Description: LDL Type. The field takes one of the following values: normal LDL - mixed LDL
